comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. Version of ~ cbvab with disjoint variable conditions requiring fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1999.) Require ` x ` , ` y ` be disjoint to avoid ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 4-Dec-2022.)
